column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////We actually tried to go to Monk's
column2: because someone had suggested it as a cool sports bar to watch a Red Sox game (I was with a coworker who's obsessed
column3: I could go either way on Boston).  But Monk's
column5: didn't have their cable working.  So we took a stroll across an amazing bridge and beautiful skyline
column6: and just happened to hit Lou's.  We were just walking briskly by and saw a big TV screen
column7: smelled some pizza and immediately RAN in.  We sat at the bar
column8: ordered my FIRST EVER deep-dish pizza and a Miller Lite and plunged IMMEDIATELY into heaven.
